chapters.title: The Advent of Mobile Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the emergence and evolution of mobile banking, highlighting its significance in modern finance.

chapters.title: Changes in Consumer Behavior
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into how mobile banking has altered consumer behavior, with a focus on increased usage and expectations.

chapters.title: The Convenience Factor
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses the convenience offered by mobile banking, including features like anytime access and streamlined services.

chapters.title: Security Measures in Mobile Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter addresses the security aspects of mobile banking, detailing measures taken to protect user data and transactions.
